title: #060 - How to go from Part-Time to Full-Time Entrepreneurship with Amanda Daley
itunes:title: #060 - How to go from Part-Time to Full-Time Entrepreneurship with Amanda Daley
description: In this episode, Alex Beadon interviews Amanda Jane Daley, a Business Mentor for Health Coaches and Wellness Entrepreneurs. They talk about how her business has grown enormously over the course of the last five years, about the trajectory of her career and the hurdles she overcame to reach success in entrepreneurship. They discuss the value of purpose, maintaining business focus, and some of the things Daley learned from an intimate conversation with Richard Branson in South Africa.
